title: Forecast Janna voiceover plays both original joke and skin joke.
body: When I play the joke using Forecast Janna, both versions of her joke play at the same time, overlapping. It is possible that the taunt and laugh are also overlapping and broken.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix. ^-^
O my, how do you manage to play the game with that happening?
This happens to me too, also curious (:
